frontmatter.title: Sunny Day 2
frontmatter.desc: Imagining and depicting sustainable tommorrow and future of technology with XR and Wearable.
frontmatter.caption: National Research Foundation
frontmatter.brief: CUBE is an interface and interaction design project that researched what kind of interaction people can do in the moving medium - mobility(cars) - when the fourth stage of autonomous driving is commercialized in the future.
frontmatter.context: With Auto driving 4.0, People will have more spare time in vehicles in the future. To imagine various scenarios and design an interface for them is needed.
frontmatter.solution: Came up with Multi-modal, Surface shifting Interface and Seat
frontmatter.associations: Human Augmentation Lab at ETRI, EnSepTion
